attributes.comment: I am the mother, case manager, and SSA Representative Payee for my now chronically disabled adult son (46 years old).  It has been horrendously difficult over the decades to navigate the disconnected systems of health care providers and services available to me and my son.  A National Director of Healthcare Providers and Services would alleviate this problem and reduce the barriers to locating and engaging seamless connectivity among providers and services in support of those living with mental illness and other forms of disabilities.  I am strongly in favor of the creation of this National Directory.  It cannot come soon enough for us families coping with fragmented access to information about providers and services.
